content.raw:
Are you seeing an error about GPU_RAY not supported? Change GPU_RAY to just RAY by following the directions here: http://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fgazebosim.org%2Ftutorials%3Ftut%3Dros_gzplugins%23GPULaser&h=KAQGcmcUQ 

It's in the valkyrie_sim_gazebo_sync.urdf file under the opt...nasa...val_description folders.

That will get you planes of data from in RVIZ. The not spinning in RVIZ is a symptom, not the problem which is no timing information in the lidar messages.
content.html:
Are you seeing an error about GPU_RAY not supported? Change GPU_RAY to just RAY by following the directions here: http://l.facebook.com/l.php?u=http%3A%2F%2Fgazebosim.org%2Ftutorials%3Ftut%3Dros_gzplugins%23GPULaser&h=KAQGcmcUQ

It's in the valkyrie_sim_gazebo_sync.urdf file under the opt...nasa...val_description folders.

That will get you planes of data from in RVIZ. The not spinning in RVIZ is a symptom, not the problem which is no timing information in the lidar messages.
